data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Varbergs.
In the minute 2, Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Varbergs's Astrit Seljmani is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Sirius.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Sirius drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Sirius at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 6, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 8, Sirius's Stefano Vecchia misses with an attempt on goal.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 9, Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
Varbergs needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Sirius's Stefano Vecchia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Free kick Varbergs.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Karl Larson for Sirius drives towards goal at Paskbergsvallen. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Victor Wolf awards the away team a throw-in.
In Varberg Sirius drive forward through Mohammed Saeid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 14, Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Sirius to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
Hampus Zackrisson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 19, Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joakim Persson (Varbergs) has taken off Hampus Zackrisson who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Albert Ejupi is the replacement.
Varbergs are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Varberg Varbergs attack through Junes Barny. The finish is off target, however.
Victor Wolf awards Sirius a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Karl Larson (Sirius) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Sirius at Paskbergsvallen.
Astrit Seljmani for Varbergs gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 25, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Varbergs's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
Sirius's Mohammed Saeid has run offside.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in Varbergs.
Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 34, Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Victor Wolf awards the home team a throw-in.
Varbergs's Luke Le Roux breaks free at Paskbergsvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Varberg.
In the minute 38, Elias Andersson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Stefano Vecchia (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 40, In Varberg Varbergs attack through Junes Barny. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 40, Sirius's Elias Andersson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Astrit Seljmani for Varbergs gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Victor Wolf awards Varbergs a goal kick.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Varbergs.
At Paskbergsvallen the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Sirius push forward at Paskbergsvallen and Mohammed Saeid gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Varbergs defence.
Victor Wolf awards Sirius a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Paskbergsvallen.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
The home team have replaced Keanin Ayer with Anton Liljenback. This is the second substitution made today by Joakim Persson.
Sirius’s Daniel Jarl is on his feet again at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 48, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniel Jarl.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
In the minute 50, Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
Corner awarded to Sirius.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Sirius.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Varbergs are coming forward and Astrit Seljmani gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sirius at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 56, Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Luke Le Roux of Varbergs smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 57, Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Sirius.
Adam Hellborg is booked for the away team.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
In the minute 64, Sirius will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Varbergs.
Varbergs are pushing forward but Astrit Seljmani's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Varberg.
In the minute 65, Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Varbergs just outside Sirius's area.
Varbergs drives forward and Jon Birkfeldt gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 66, Varbergs's Robin Book gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sirius have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sirius at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 67, Varbergs take a 1-0 lead thanks to Gustaf Norlin.
That's a fine assist from Astrit Seljmani.
Free kick in a good position for Sirius!
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Elias Andersson with Laorent Shabani.
Varbergs move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Astrit Seljmani is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 73, Free kick Varbergs.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Adam Stahl is replacing Karl Larson for the away team.
In the minute 78, Hjalmar Ekdal is on a sub for Mohammed Saeid for Sirius.
Sirius's Yukiya Sugita gets in a shot on goal at Paskbergsvallen. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Sirius's Yukiya Sugita breaks free at Paskbergsvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
Victor Wolf awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a fourth substitution, with Johan Karlsson replacing Adam Hellborg.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 84, Victor Wolf signals a Sirius throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Victor Wolf signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Joakim Persson is making the team's third substitution at Paskbergsvallen with Gideon Mensah replacing Joakim Lindner.
In the minute 85, Tashreeq Matthews is replacing Robin Book for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
The home team have replaced Junes Barny with Erion Sadiku. This is the fifth substitution made today by Joakim Persson.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Gustaf Norlin returns to the field for Varbergs after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 88, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gustaf Norlin for Varbergs who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 89, Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Victor Wolf signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Varbergs's area.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Victor Wolf.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Varbergs.
Victor Wolf will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Victor Wolf blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
